mapper.select: select id, type, num, question_num, question_type, question_category, answer from batch_exam_toeic_question where type = #{type} and num = #{num} order by question_num
mapper.insert: insert into batch_exam_toeic_question ( created, created_id, modified, modified_id, type, num, question_num, question_type, question_category, answer )values( now(), #{created_id}, now(), #{modified_id}, #{type}, #{num}, #{question_num}, #{question_type}, #{question_category}, #{answer} )
